course_description: This course will highlight the wide range of legal issues implicated by such laws and efforts both domestically and abroad. Through this course of instruction, students will analyze issues involving international and domestic law as it relates to counterterrorism activities, the authorities for use of force, offensive operations overseas, surveillance of terrorists, capture, detention, and interrogation of terrorism suspects, prosecutions in military commissions and domestic courts, and other legal authorities for addressing terrorism-related issues.
